page.description: Parse and convert the query parameters from a URI string.

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The extension::URIQuery Class is a utility class that makes it very easy to parse name/value pairs in a 'query string'. The following Interactive Window session demonstrates use of this class:
section.example:
dim qs as c = "name=fred&city=boston&country=&age=25" dim postQ as extension::URIQuery postQ.ParseURIQuery(qs) ?qs = "name=fred&city=boston&country=&age=25"
?postq.age = "25"
?postq.country = ""
?postq.ToJson() = {"name":"fred","city":"boston","country":"","age":"25"}
